title: Suntory Minami Alps no Tennensui
content:
This is totally nothing out of the ordinary, just another commercial, related to anime, *weebs intensifying*.
It's disgusting really, we're at that stage where we'd consume literally anything if it was marketed the right way.
“Suntory Minami Alps no Tennen Mizu” is a collaboration with Suntory and Kimi no Na Wa, obviously aimed at the fans to sale some extra water bottles, it seems on the surface that they tried too much to sell it out, they even adapted some deep symbolism from the movie itself to make some sense out of the 3 related but at the same time different perspective on presenting the same ideathat only becomes full circle at the last episode.
It can almost deceive you to giving it somewhat a considerable score, but no, nothing of that makes up for the wast of time it really was.
